properties.name: jeap.governance.archrepo.url
properties.description: URL of the ArchRepo to import data from

properties.name: jeap.governance.archrepo.timeout
properties.description: Timeout for requests to the ArchRepo

properties.name: jeap.governance.archrepo.import.apidocversion.enabled
properties.description: Flag to enable/disable the import of API documentation versions from the ArchRepo

properties.name: jeap.governance.archrepo.import.databaseschemaversion.enabled
properties.description: Flag to enable/disable the import of database schema versions from the ArchRepo

properties.name: jeap.governance.archrepo.import.reactiongraph.enabled
properties.description: Flag to enable/disable the import of reactions graphs from the ArchRepo

properties.name: jeap.governance.archrepo.import.restapirelationwithoutpact.enabled
properties.description: Flag to enable/disable the import of REST api relations without pact from the ArchRepo
